Name: Christmas Margarita
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange twist, rosemary sprig and dried with cranberries, or dehydrated orange slice wheel..
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Garnish with rosemary sprig spiked with dried cranberries, or float a dehydrated orange slice.
Review: The Cosmopolitan meets the Margarita in this gloriously pink cocktail.
History: A Christmas cocktail created in October 2011 by yours truly and then revisited in November 2020. Christmas Margarita (2011 recipe) Glass: Coupe Garnish: Orange Zest twist Method: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. 45ml / 1½oz Reposado tequila 45ml / 1½oz Cranberry juice 15ml / ½oz Grand Marnier Cordon Rouge 15ml / ½oz Lime juice (freshly squeezed)
Nutrition: One serving of Christmas Margarita contains 185 calories
